name: Killzone
description:
Killzone is an action-shooter game developed by Guerrilla Games. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Killzone has a score of 70. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Killzone is available on PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3.
It was scored by Joris de Man.
